item.title: CVE-2024-30555|2024-03-31T19:48:01.408Z -- Sayan Datta -- Ultimate Social Comments – Email Notification & Lazy Load
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Sayan Datta Ultimate Social Comments – Email Notification & Lazy Load allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ultimate Social Comments – Email Notification & Lazy Load: from n/a through 1.4.8.
